price: 37. Everyman that Day will have enough to make him careless of others.
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
